Korean Sticky Fried Chicken (Yangnyeom Tongdak)
For the sauce
60g dark brown sugar
30g gochujang (Korean chilli paste)
30g soy sauce
10g garlic cloves, crushed
25g ginger, grated
10g sesame oil
For the chicken
300g chicken breast sliced
20g ginger, finely grated
35g cornflour
4g salt
0.7g ground glack pepper
Canola oil, for frying
sesame seeds and sliced spring onion, to serve
  1. Blitz all the sauce ingredients in a food processor, then let bubble gently for a few minutes in a saucepan
  2. For the chicken, mix with the ginger, then add the cornflour, salt and pepper
  3. Deep fry in 180-190C oil, then stir fry quickly in the sauce
  4. Sprinkle the spring onion and sesame seeds over when serving
Serving Suggestions
  • Serve with white rice
Variations
  • The base recipe makes quite a sticky thick sauce. If you want more of a dipping sauce consistency, add some pineapple juice when blitzing it
